name: Apotheosis DEMO
description:
Apotheosis is single player turn based RPG that takes place in a surreal universe. Discover the powers of the Archetypes that lie within and use them to your advantage. Solve puzzles, explore mazes, collect allies and unveil the truth about your past.

We would really appreciate any amount you'd wish to donate! We are also planning on starting a fundraiser if you guys like it!
We want to hear your feedback on this project!
Please, follow us on social media:

Discord
Instagram
Steam
